message:
حفلة الأسبوع 

المسألة من Google Code jam ، بتحكى عن لعبة connect 4 بس ليها خاصية زيادة ان الأعمدة مفتوحة بالعرض فلو قلبت البوردة ٩٠ درجة و الجاذبية سحبت الcoins للأرض الترتيب هايتغير و ممكن انت تكسب او زميلك يكسب او انتوا الإتنين او ماحدش يكسب، فبيقولك لو بتلعب مع حد و هاتغش فى اللعبة بانك تدورها قولنا مين هايكسب 
https://code.google.com/codejam/contest/544101/dashboard
المسألة interesting صراحة و اتمنى ان اننا نشوف حلول creative  ^_^
Happy Coding Geeks

data.message: Geish It's really hard to read your code especially the won function but thanks for the variable K idea :D

I don't worry about readability when I solve programming challenges, but for the sake of sharing, I can explain; won checks the board in the same order of ways to win as described in the problem (vertically, horizontally, and diagonally), and solve reads the input and rotates a row to be a column treated as a stack that only accepts R's or B's.
ايه ده انا ازاي ما شفتش البوست ده. ححاول الاقي وقت احلها أن شاء الله

The two good tricks in my solutions are:
1. the use of dynamic programming to find the winner.
2. the use of multithreding to solve questions in parallel, and to check the each player in parallel. This won't be really useful unless you have multiprocessors machine because the operation is CPU pound, but I thought it's a good opportunity to show how easy is it to write multithreaded core in .NET

https://github.com/mahref/CodeJam/blob/master/BoardSolver.cs
